alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:09PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rapides and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lacamp, or 9 miles east of Slagle, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Slagle, Lacamp, Kurthwood, Hutton, Clifton, Flatwoods and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
